title: Tua's Head And Neck Injury
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss Mike McDaniel’s comments on Tua’s head and neck injury, John Harbaugh’s reaction to Tua’s injury and Doug Pederson’s return to Philly this weekend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Reactions to Tua's injury from around the league and Doug Pederson's upcoming return to Philly.
